item.description:
Surprise! Vibram (vee-brum) is coming to TMIRCE. They'll be doing some really cool stuff like: -raffling off 2 Free Pairs of 5-fingers -providing ProDeals to a select few recipients (maybe 5 or so) -ask some trivia questions,  -raffle off 5 of our limited edition organic cotton T-Shirts – featuring our Saber Tooth Tiger design – you'll see this tomorrow! Breakfast Details : Between 11:15 and 11:30 (depending on how long we run) we will meet at CITY SPORTS @ BU* for breakfast. If you would like to bring a breakfast item to share (eggs, bagels, fruits, muffins, juice, bacon, potatoes, etc.) please feel free to do so. You are not obligated to bring anything, though, so please join us for breakfast after the run!

ALL ABILITY LEVELS ARE WELCOME!!!

Meter parking is easily accessible on Comm Ave. and also Gardner St. which runs parallel behind the store. The B train on the Green Line stops directly across from the store at Babcock St.

* "The Rock" has moved to CITY SPORTS located at the intersection of Commonwealth Ave. and Babcock St.

View City Sports in a larger map

 

informalrunning.com

Read the BLOG

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Vibram at TMIRCE Saturday @ City Sports
